business-schedule.title: Business to be taken in Westminster Hall
business-schedule.division-heading: Business to be taken in Westminster Hall

business-item.title: Debate on the Ninth Report of the Environmental Audit Committee, Session2007-08, on Carbon Capture and Storage, HC 654, and the Government response,Cm 7605.
Debate on the Report from the Joint Committee on Human Rights entitled Demonstrating Respect For Rights? A Human Rights Approach to Policing Protest.

forthcoming-debates.debates-rubric: From the week beginning 8 February 2010, Departments will answer adjournment debates in Westminster Hall according to the following rota:
forthcoming-debates.notice: Culture, Media and Sport; Environment, Food and Rural Affairs; Foreign and Commonwealth Office; International Development; Leader of the House; Minister for the Olympics; Northern Ireland; Solicitor General; Treasury; Work and Pensions.
